catalog_info.title: Statistical Inference I
catalog_info.notes: Tu., Th., 1–2:30, and weekly sections to be arranged. Formerly Stat 211a
catalog_info.description: Inference: frequency, Bayes, decision analysis, foundations. Likelihood, sufficiency, and information measures. Models: Normal, exponential families, multilevel, and non-parametric. Point, interval and set estimation; hypothesis tests. Computational strategies, large and moderate sample approximations.
